document_data.name: House Arkhenneld
document_data.Organization: House Arkhenneld appeared not to be an especially established house, but had some of their members spread around the [[Underdark]].
document_data.Activities: Some members of the house were interested in [[wizard]]ry, with one becoming an apprentice of [[Elminster Aumar]] (which [[Mystra]] did not mind), and another becoming Master Emeritus of the [[School of Enchantment and Charm]] in [[Sshamath]] (and devoting his life to Mystra).
